name: JavaScript Framework Debug Mode
description: Detects JavaScript frameworks running in development/debug mode. Vue.js, React, Angular, and other frameworks expose debug tools, source maps, and developer consoles in production which can leak source code and sensitive information.
author: Dominator Team
remediation: Disable debug mode in production builds. For Vue.js: set Vue.config.devtools = false and use production build. For React: use production build and remove React DevTools. For Angular: use ng build --prod. Remove source maps from production. Disable console logging.
